title: "DystoWall"
content:
Welcome to DystoWall - the ultimate destination for those who seek to experience a futuristic, dystopian world through stunning visuals. Our website features a captivating wallpaper that showcases a stylized illustration of a dark and chaotic future, complete with metallic textures and digital glitch effects.

With our wallpaper as your backdrop, you'll feel like you've been transported into an alternate reality where technology has taken over and humanity is struggling to survive. Whether you're a fan of science fiction or just appreciate breathtaking artwork, DystoWall is the perfect place to find inspiration and fuel your imagination.

So why wait? Download our wallpaper today and immerse yourself in a world of endless possibilities. Join our community of like-minded individuals who share your passion for all things dystopian and start exploring the depths of your creativity.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a stylized illustration of a dystopian future, with metallic textures and digital glitch effects."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
